attributes.title: Secrets of Karma Revealed by Paramahamsa Nithyananda
attributes.description:
A Special Webinar by Paramahamsa Nithyananda delivered on 2nd August, 2015

In the special global webinar on 'Secrets of Karma', His Holiness Paramahamsa Nithyananda revealed the unknown, ultimate sacred secrets of karma – the myths and truths of 'karma, action', good, bad and beyond, that have always been binding and puzzling the human minds, acts for many births and deaths. He gave the straight definition of karma, “any thought current or thought pattern in which you are stuck is Karma. Suffocating thought currents, suffocating thought patterns, suffocating thought trends, is Karma.” We may have heard many concepts, truths but if they have not caused our reality and are not giving us constant breakthrough, it is only karma for us.
From his ferocious space of Kalabhairava, Sadashiva, which does not accept the part-time freedom in which people are stuck, Paramahamsa Nithyananda opened the way to be liberated from karmas. The way out of this huge net of karma is – to discard the whole thought current we have. “NA ITI, NA ITI, not this, not this. Not just discarding one thought, thought pattern, discarding thought current is Completion.” In the Q&A session that followed, Paramahamsa Nithyananda, from His enlightened liberated being, questioned the many answers we have about karma – what are the types of karma, how to cancel the karmic bondages, and if karma can be burnt, changed.
The ultimate solution to be liberated and break from all karmas is INNER AWAKENING. “Breaking everything that can be broken or can’t be broken in you, is Awakening. Whatever you cannot break in you, whatever I can break it, is Inner Awakening.” (www.innerawakening.org)
